sources.title: The double impact of deep social unrest and a pandemic: Evidence from Chile
sources.snippet: 1. Introduction. Chile faced two significant macroeconomic shocks in the last quarter of 2019 and during 2020. The first event on October 18, 2019, was the "Social Explosion," in which massive political protests motivated by social demands disrupted transportation in significant parts of the country and affected several businesses, particularly the retail sector and construction.
